dcterms:creator: S. P. Stromberg
J. Carlson
dcterms:description: A mathematical model that describes the dynamics of immune components in both the innate and adaptive immune branches, incorporating pathogen-specific immune memory and exhibiting steady states similar to clinically observed immune outcomes.
dcterms:title: Integrated Immune Branch (IIB) Model

dcterms:creator: A. Reynolds
J. Rubin
G. Clermont
J. Day
Y. Vodovotz
G. B. Ermentrout
dcterms:description: A reduced mathematical model of the acute inflammatory response that analyzes the dynamics of the innate immune response following pathogen encounters.
dcterms:title: Reynolds et al. Innate Immune Model

dcterms:creator: S. P. Stromberg
J. Carlson
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides information on the distribution of pathogen shapes, which is used to model immune responses in the context of immunosenescence.
dcterms:title: Pathogen Shape Distribution

dcterms:creator: A. Wikby
B.-O. Nilsson
R. Forsey
J. Thompson
J. Strindhall
S. LÃ¶fgren
J. Ernerudh
G. Pawelec
F. Ferguson
B. Johansson
dcterms:description: The immune risk phenotype (IRP) is associated with increased levels of IL-6 in elderly individuals, indicating a decline in immune function and increased mortality risk.
dcterms:title: Immune Risk Phenotype (IRP)

dcterms:creator: A. Aiello
F. Farzaneh
G. Candore
C. Caruso
S. Davinelli
C. M. Gambino
M. E. Ligotti
N. Zareian
G. Accardi
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses the impact of cytomegalovirus (CMV) infections on immunosenescence and its associated hallmarks.
dcterms:title: Cytomegalovirus (CMV) Infections

dcterms:creator: T. T. Yoshikawa
dcterms:description: A dataset that highlights important infections in elderly persons, emphasizing the increased morbidity and mortality associated with infectious diseases in this demographic.
dcterms:title: Aging and Infectious Diseases

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides clinical features of COVID-19 in elderly patients, comparing them with younger and middle-aged patients.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Clinical Features
